description.narrative: FMO is providing financing to SANAD through an investment of USD 15 million in the senior tranche of the debt sub-fund, money that will be on-lent by local partners to MSMEs. The investment comes from the MASSIF Fund, which FMO manages on behalf of the Dutch Ministry of Foreign Affairs. Supporting SANAD is an important step for MASSIF to further support entrepreneurs and SMEs in this (conflict) affected part of the world.

participating-org.narrative: Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Netherlands

provider-org.narrative: Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Netherlands

description.narrative: An activity that contains sub-activities (sub-components) which are reported separately to IATI
